description: At Hampton By Hilton Birmingham City North, you'll be just a 5-minute drive from Birmingham Cathedral and Big Brum. You can visit the fitness center for a workout or unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. Other highlights include a snack bar/deli, and rooms offer LCD TVs and free WiFi.

DESCRIPTION.value: At Hampton By Hilton Birmingham City North, you'll be just a 5-minute drive from Birmingham Cathedral and Big Brum. You can visit the fitness center for a workout or unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. Other highlights include a snack bar/deli, and rooms offer LCD TVs and free WiFi.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The hotel offers a snack bar/deli. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning. High-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary.

This 3.5-star property offers access to a business center and a meeting room. Event facilities measure 269 square feet (25 square meters). This Birmingham hotel also offers a fitness center, coffee/tea in a common area, and an elevator (lift).

Hampton By Hilton Birmingham City North is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value: Guests are offered a complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast each morning.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Coventry (CVT) - 31 km / 19.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hampton By Hilton Birmingham City North is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in Birmingham, this hotel is within a 15-minute walk of Red Palace and Birmingham Cathedral. International Convention Centre and Bullring Shopping Centre are also within 1 mi (2 km).

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Late check-out fee: GBP 20

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.
